did.abstract: This collection was created and collected by members of the McGivern and Burke families, who were active in the Belfast United Club in the Bronx during the 1950s. This collection consists of materials documenting the activities of the Belfast United Club in the Bronx, including photographs and brochures from the organization's functions and sporting events.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: This collection was created and collected by members of the McGivern and Burke families, who were active in the Belfast United Club in the Bronx during the 1950s.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection are held by their creators. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which s/he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting the donors.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: This collected was donated to the Archives of Irish America in January of 2015 by Dana Kelly, Lisa Fullard, and Nancy Mercurio. The accession number associated with this gift is 2015.008.
